title: Game freezing
body:
Ok so I'm a new player to league and haven't had much experience but I keep freezing on the load screen whenever I try to join a game, sometimes it gets fixed by around 1 minute after the game starts, sometimes it doesn't get fixed at all and it rarely happens to work nicely with no delay. I have a brother who has the same exact Laptop and is playing smoothly with no freezing. I also get a big lag spike whenever I press O to view kills and stuff or whenever I try to see other tabs on my laptop by pressing Alt + Tab the screen is frozen on the LOL loading screen that isn't progressing and if I attempt to close it to reopen it I can't close it and have had to shutdown my laptop through the power button many times just to get rid of it.
Your help will be kindly appreciated.

replies.body: Some of your game files may not be working properly anymore for some strange reason. Let's try grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with *reinstall and clean uninstall*. Let me know if that doesn't help!
